title: Secret Santa
body:
(had to start fresh as the previous one became a war zone)

It's the holiday season and 'tis the season of giving. I thought it'd be a good idea to set up a 'Secret Santa' type activity within the OCE community.

If you are interested in this, do let me know in the comments so when can set this up by Christmas.

Instructions:

1. Enter in the comments if you will participate

2. In the same comment, enter the top 3 things you want for Christmas

3. Wait for someone to pick you as their giftee and give you **one** of those items

Enjoy your gift

Disclaimer: This may not be a success, it might be. And, do please make your request reasonable!

Merry Christmas!

replies.body:
Hey guys,

I think this an awesome idea, but unfortunately it looks like some people ruined the last one without me noticing :( **I'll be removing any comments not related to Secret Santa on this post.**

Thanks for doing this BTW StealthVortex88 :D

Hmm, let me have a think about this...

I know:
1 - Heartseeker Quinn.
2 - Heartseeker Quinn.
3 - Heartseeker Quinn.

I've sent you an add =D I don't think I will be able to get you exactly that but I will try to think of something cool when the day restriction is up.

Happy holidays friend

But... But... Heartseeker Quinn...

I guess I'll accept anything as long as it's free...

Happy holidays!
Hope you like it =D

This is a great idea! I would really love a Vladimir skin (except Bloodlord because I have that one).  I really like this idea because it expresses the season of giving, and with the positive feedback I reckon Riot might do something with this in the future! Good work mate
I'll add you :)!

I would like the camille skin or just a 10 dollar RP card, 
Thanks!

I'll get you Program Camille!

I'll send you a friend request on my main "SparksElm".

Merry Xmas everyone!

Also, ONE DAY TO CHRISTMAS WHOOOOO!!!

Hey guys cheers for the great idea of giving each other gifts of joy for the holidays i truly believe this is strengthening the bond between the community players and riot games. the skins  i would like for Christmas would be Yellow jacket shen (520) and frozen shen (520) really like the concept of these two skins as the resemble the two main fights from one of my favourite games MK (Mortal Kombat, subzero and Scorpian)  or one of either. really like these sort of ideas by  the community, looking forward to future ideas. keep it up guys
 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Thats what sets Riot apart from other companies!

Hi all, Merry Christmas and happy new year :-)

My precious secret Santa list is as follows:

1. Mecha Zero Sion
2. Blood Moon Zilean
3. Blood Stone Taric

I primary play support with Zilean and Taric being my two most played with Sion on his way up :-)

Here's hoping to a visit by Santa or one of his little elfs :-)

Kind regards

FunRun
Any fizz skin would be ideal

Hi! This sounds like a great idea but I have a few questions regarding the Secret Santa.
1. If you get chosen, do you also have to gift something in return or is it basically a freebie?
2. Are the gifts limited to skins only?
3. How long will this Secret Santa last? I'd like to participate but I'm unsure as to what "gift" I'd like to get.
With that being said Merry Christmas, OCE!

I'll answer those concerns, friend!

1. If you get chosen, it's really up to you whether you want to give back (preferably yes)
2. No, you can ask for other stuff, e.g rune pages and champions
3. Hopefully when everyone has a gift!

Thanks for the quick response! I also got one more question, can you change your 3 wishes? So far this is what I desire:
1. Camille.
2. 7 rune page bundle.
3. 975 RP (or 1350 RP if someone is feeling very generous :]).

I would contribute, but alas I am saving up money for a move and therefore have not bought any RP in the last many months with the exception of just enough for Elementalist Lux. So I will offer you what I can in the form of Merry Christmas to all of you!
Merry Christmas to you as well! :)
